text:
TELEVISION MONITORING STUDIES
7
Publ.
No®
M“1 New York Television (Studies #1 and #4) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New York City
television stations during the period January 4-10, 1951 and
January 4-10, 1952. 108 pp. Paper, $3.00 (Special price to
NAEB members - $1,00)
Los Angeles Television (Study #2) - Dallas W. Smythe and Angus Campbell
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the Los Angeles
television stations during the period May 23-29, 1951. 94 pp.
Paper. $3.00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
M“3 Chicago Summer Television (Study #3) - Hans 0. Mauksch, Donald Horton,
and Kurt Lang
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the Chicago
television stations on August 5, 1951. 73 pp. Paper. $3.00
(Special price to NAEB members - $1,00)
M-4 New Haven Television (Study #5) - Dallas W, Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New Haven
television station during the period May 15-21, 1952. 119 pp.
Paper. $3,00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
Three Years of New York Television (Study #6) - Dallas W, Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New York
City television stations during the period January 4-10, 1953
and compared with January 4-10, 1951 and 1952. 161 pp. Paper.
$3*00 (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
ivl-6 Four Years of New York Television (Study #7) - H. H. Remmers (Purdue
Opinion Panel)
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New York
City television stations during the period January 25-31, 1954 and
compared with the three previous years. 92 pp. Paper. $3.00
(Special price to NAEB members - $1.00)
R-2 See also Some Comparisons Between British and American Television (Research
Project if2) - John T, Suchy
Excerpts from a thesis presented in partial fulfillment of the
requirements for the M.A. Degree in Journalism at the State
University of Iowa. October, 1954. 22 pp. Paper. 50$
M-10 Complete set of all Monitoring Studies listed above, $12.00 (Special
price to NAEB members - $4*00)
